content: Personal Errand Runner
Hire a personal errand runner to complete necessary errands so that the commuter can free up their time
Time-saving, convenience, task execution, trustworthiness, door-to-door service
TaskRabbit, Thumbtack, Fiverr, Gofer
Offers a personalized, one-on-one experience that is tailored to the individual's specific needs
Telecommuting Consultancy
A service that enables commuters to discuss with consultants the possibility and logistics of working from home/at a remote location
Feasibility assessment, telecommuting plan, remote work tools recommendations, remote communication training, work-life balance advice
FlexJobs, Remote.co, CoWorking Resources, Workfrom, Remote Year
Provides a customized plan for each individual and is not limited to just recommending remote work opportunities
In-Car Exercise Equipment
Create a line of innovative exercise equipment designed specifically for use during car commutes
Convenience, time-saving, fitness, safety, affordability
GymPact, Fitocracy, RunKeeper, MyFitnessPal, DailyBurn
Offers a unique solution to a time-crunched commuter's lack of exercise that cannot be found elsewhere
Mobile Car Detailing
Offer a mobile car detailing service that can be performed in the parking lot of the commuter's workplace
Convenience, time-saving, quality service, attention to detail, flexible scheduling
Washos, Mobile Wash, Car Spa, DetailXPerts, Detailing Knights
Offers a highly convenient and time-saving service that can be fit into a busy work day
pain_point_description: commuters face long, stressful work commutes that can take up a significant amount of time every day. this leaves them little time to engage in activities that are important to them like working out, spending time with family, or pursuing hobbies
